title: SOLD - 1887-90 Old Judge Hugh Duffy HOF RC  (SGC 40)
author: Archive

posts.post_title: SOLD - 1887-90 Old Judge Hugh Duffy HOF RC  (SGC 40)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Phil Garry
Good Morning, Collectors:

Up for sale today is a very clean 1887-90 Old Judge Hugh Duffy HOF Rookie Card which has been graded an SGC 40 by the strict graders at Sportscard Guaranty Company, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scans of the front and back of the card for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $695.00 dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: vguerrerobb@yahoo.com


[IMG]http://i150.photobucket.com/albums/s120/bcbgcbrcb/HDuffy.jpg[/IMG]


[IMG]http://i150.photobucket.com/albums/s120/bcbgcbrcb/HDuffyB.jpg[/IMG]
